message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and the high demand, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I've seen similar products on the market for this price, and I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. This product offers unique features and quality that you won't find elsewhere.  I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $14,000. I've done my research and I think that's the maximum I'm willing to pay.
